title: Report: Texas Makes Strides in Energy Efficiency
text:
22 Report: Texas Makes Strides in Energy Efficiency 
Texas Tribune: After a years-long tumble, Texas has taken a major leap forward in an annual state-by-state ranking of energy efficiency policies â€” those aimed at slashing utility bills and carbon emissions by curbing energy use.
